message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $175?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $175 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. How about we meet in the middle again at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to compromise. How about we meet at $155?
I'm really close to making a decision, but $155 is still a bit steep. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?
